name: Saudi Public Transport Company
description: Saudi Public Transport Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of transportation services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. It operates through Passenger Transport; Specialized Services; Concession Arrangements for the King Abdul-Aziz Project for Public Transport in Riyadh; Digital Mobility Solutions; and Technical Shared Services segments. The company offers public transportation services, which connects cities within the kingdom; electronic services in public transportation, such as mobile application and ticket vending machine self-service; national intercity transportation service linking cities and villages in the kingdom; international transportation services for passengers from cities in the kingdom to the neighboring Gulf and Arab countries, including United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, and Egypt; specialized transportation services; and maintenance, repair, and logistics services. It is also involved in the transfer of non-postal parcels and cargo; school transport and teachers transport services; car rental and private transport services; and import of spare parts and chemical detergents for vehicles. In addition, the company operates and maintains trains, metros, and motor vehicles and trucks; organizes tours; and transports pilgrims and visitors inside and outside of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Further, it provides digital mobility solutions, which include passenger solutions, eJourney platform, FinUP, MerAPP, and Fastmile services. Additionally, the company offers driver training services, and systems analysis and self-mobility technologies. Saudi Public Transport Company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
